channel.title: Hi,Need help
channel.description:
I need help adding working massing and food timers to my server.I added some but to train its like 1 click per 20 seconds.
if you know how to help thanks.

item.title: Hi,Need help
item.dc:creator: @smartdude6 smartdude6
item.description:
@smartdude6 wrote:

somthing like this for massing

if(playerLevel[10] >= 0) { if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 200; startAnimation(621); addItem(315,1); sendMessage("You Fish a shrimp"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[10]), 10); } else { sendMessage("HOLD ON DONT MASS..."); } } }

Read full topic
